Controller package¶

Submodules¶

Controller.add_product_controller module¶

Controller.add_product_controller.add_product(request: Request)[source]¶

Displays the add product page.

Parameters:

request (Request) – FastAPI request object

Returns:

Shows add_product.html with category options from database.

Return type:

TemplateResponse

async Controller.add_product_controller.submit_product(request: Request, p_name: str = Form(PydanticUndefined), p_description: str = Form(PydanticUndefined), p_price: float = Form(PydanticUndefined), p_quantity: int = Form(PydanticUndefined), p_category: str = Form(PydanticUndefined), product_image: UploadFile = Form(None))[source]¶

Adds a new product to database by calling functions.

Parameters:

  • request (Request) – FastAPI request object.

  • p_name (str) – Product name.

  • p_description (str) – Product description.

  • p_price (str) – Product price.

  • p_quantity (int) – Product quantity in stock.

  • p_category (str) – Category id.

  • product_image (file) – One image of the product

Returns:

Shows admin_dashbaord.html if product is added successfully. Otherwise shows the add_product.html with an error message.

Return type:

TemplateResponse

Controller.edit_product_controller module¶

Controller.edit_product_controller.edit_product(request: Request, p_id: str)[source]¶

Displays edit product page with existing product’s information that was fetched by the corresponding product’s id.

Parameters:

  • request (Request) – FastAPI request object.

  • p_id (str) – Product id.

Returns:

Shows edit_product.html with the product’s existing information fetched from database.

Return type:

TemplateResponse

async Controller.edit_product_controller.update_product(request: Request, p_id: str = Form(PydanticUndefined), p_name: str = Form(PydanticUndefined), p_description: str = Form(PydanticUndefined), p_price: float = Form(PydanticUndefined), p_quantity: int = Form(PydanticUndefined), p_category: str = Form(PydanticUndefined), prev_product_image: str = Form(PydanticUndefined), product_image: UploadFile = Form(None))[source]¶

Updates an existing product’s information in the database. Replaces the older image if a new one is chosen.

Parameters:

  • request (Request) – FastAPI request object.

  • p_id (Str) – Product id of the targeted product.

  • p_name (str) – Product name.

  • p_description (str) – Product description.

  • p_price (str) – Product price.

  • p_quantity (int) – Product quantity in stock.

  • p_category (str) – Category id.

  • prev_product_image (str) – URL of the product’s existing image.

  • product_image (file) – New image of the product

Returns:

Shows admin_dashbaord.html if update is successfull. Otherwise shows edit_product.html with an error message.

Return type:

TemplateResponse
